CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro customers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join on Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro customers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: This update provides several DLP capabilities for macOS, including support for Bluetooth, ability to customize notifications, auto-quarantine, tamper protection, ability to create app groups and granular app restrictions policies, and support for Japanese language.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhancements to DLP capabilities on macOS endpoints (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description:
This update provides several DLP capabilities
for macOS, including support for Bluetooth, ability to customize notifications,
auto-quarantine, tamper protection, ability to create app groups and granular
app restrictions policies, and support for Japanese language.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: False positive email release from Quarantine through threat explorer, email summary panel, advanced hunting, and custom detection email entity page take action
CurrentVersion.description: ,SecOps can now mange False positives and take move to inbox (i.e. release) quarantined messages from Threat explorer, advanced hunting, custom detection and Email entity page without the need to tab out to the Quarantine portal to take the action.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: False positive email release from Quarantine through threat explorer, email summary panel, advanced hunting, and custom detection email entity page take action
OldVersion.description: ,SecOps can now mange False positives and take move to inbox (i.e. release) quarantined messages from Threat explorer, advanced hunting, custom detection and Email entity page without the need to tab out to the Quarantine portal to take the action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share contact information of people in Microsoft Teams chat
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now share the contact information of someone who is not in a chat to make it easy for others to confidently get to know other collaborators.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share contact information of people in Microsoft Teams chat
OldVersion.description: Users can now share the contact information of someone who is not in a chat to make it easy for others to confidently get to know other collaborators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User reported events in Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management
CurrentVersion.description: When an end user reports an issue from a Teams Rooms device, a feedback event is raised in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal. This event provides managers with the necessary data to act on the feedback or open a support case with logs that were generated by the end user. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: User reported events in Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro Management
OldVersion.description: When an end user reports an issue from a Teams Rooms device, a feedback event is raised in the Teams Rooms Pro Management portal. This event provides managers with the necessary data to act on the feedback or open a support case with logs that were generated by the end user. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Forms: Pre-filled link in Microsoft Forms
CurrentVersion.description: You can send respondents a form with some fields already filled in. This feature is designed to simplify respondent experience and improve data accuracy.

OldVersion.title: Forms: Pre-filled link in Microsoft Forms
OldVersion.description: You can send respondents a form with some fields already filled in. This feature is designed to simplify respondent experience and improve data accuracy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
CurrentVersion.description:
Frontline Managers can use the Shifts plug-in for Copilot to retrieve insights on shifts, open shifts and time off leveraging data from the Shifts app in addition to user and company
 data it’s able to access.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts plugin for Copilot for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description:
Frontline Managers can use the Shifts plug-in for Copilot to retrieve insights on shifts, open shifts and time off leveraging data from the Shifts app in addition to user and company
 data it’s able to access.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
OldVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Add or remove people from the response notification emails
CurrentVersion.description: Now form owners can add or remove people from the response notification emails. Currently only the form owner or the group alias is notified when someone responds to a form.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Add or remove people from the response notification emails
OldVersion.description: Now form owners can add or remove people from the response notification emails. Currently only the form owner or the group alias is notified when someone responds to a form.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Define criteria for validating responses to open-text questions in Microsoft Forms
CurrentVersion.description: Now you can set specific requirements for answers to open-text questions. You can ensure the answer is an email address, URL, contains certain keywords, must be number or text, etc.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: Define criteria for validating responses to open-text questions in Microsoft Forms
OldVersion.description: Now you can set specific requirements for answers to open-text questions. You can ensure the answer is an email address, URL, contains certain keywords, must be number or text, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
OldVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: IPv6 allow and block support in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create allow and block entries for IPv6 directly inside the Tenant Allow/Block List.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Third party add-in user report can be sent to Microsoft for analysis
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and security analysts of organizations who use a third-party reporting add-in in Outlook can configure using user-reported settings to send their user reports to Microsoft for analysis and learning.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New enhancements to Restricted access control using Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra security groups
CurrentVersion.description: ,Restricted access control (RAC) is a premium security policy that lets admins restrict access to SharePoint and OneDrive resources to a specific set of users configured using Microsoft 365 or Entra Security groups. As part of this change, new capabilities will be added to review the impact of RAC application using insights reports and additional options to configure the policy will be made available. Also, policy enforcement visibility will be extended to Site owners via SharePoint sites.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment
CurrentVersion.description: Enrollment time grouping for iOS/iPadOS automated device enrollment (ADE) ensures targeted apps and policies can get to devices faster and reduce latency of device setup. ETG will only be part of new iOS/iPadOS enrollment policies. Admins can add a static Entra ID group into the enrollment policy, so devices will be part of that group upon enrollment, reducing latency of targeted policies and apps.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting ID and passcode to join on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT Admins can configure and require a meeting ID and passcode to join a meeting on Teams Rooms on Windows to ensure higher levels of security and privacy. This feature is available for Teams Rooms Pro customers.
